additional_info: The fastener shown in the section view in the engineering drawing is the critical fastener. It has 1 thread/mm.
additional_info_context: In the CAD views, the fastner highlighted in pink is the critical fastener.
explanation: The rules require a minimum of 3 threads showing for critical fasteners. Since there is 1 thread per millimeter and we have a extended bolt length of over 3mm we are rules compliant.
